abstract: Of the 10,000 deals that were done during China’s private equity boom of the past decade, about 7,500 are still searching for an exit.
snippet: Of the 10,000 deals that were done during China’s private equity boom of the past decade, about 7,500 are still searching for an exit.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Welcome to the private equity game in China: you can buy in anytime you like, but you can never leave.

headline.main: Private Equity in China: Which Way Out?
